channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【Why do we have header files <pshpackN.h> and <poppack.h> instead of just issuing the pragma directly?】为什么我们有头文件 <pshpackN.h> 和 <poppack.h> 而不是直接发出 pragma？
item.description: 【Because the pragma may not work everywhere.】因为该编译指示可能并非在所有地方都有效。

item.title: 【.NET Conf 2024 Recap – Celebrating .NET 9, AI, Community, & More】.NET Conf 2024 回顾 – 庆祝 .NET 9、AI、社区等
item.description: 【.NET Conf 2024 is over, but you can catch up with all the announcement and fun with video recordings, slides, demos, and more.】.NET Conf 2024 已经结束，但您可以通过视频录制、幻灯片、演示等了解所有公告和乐趣。

item.title: 【Effortlessly access cloud resources across Azure tenants without using secrets】无需使用密钥即可轻松访问 Azure 租户之间的云资源
item.description: 【Announcing the Public Preview of Managed Identities as Federated Identity Credentials for Microsoft Entra. Enhance security by removing secrets, simplify setup, and enable seamless cross-tenant access to Entra-protected resources like Azure and Microsoft Graph.】宣布推出作为 Microsoft Entra 联合身份凭证的托管身份的公开预览版。通过删除机密、简化设置以及实现对受 Entra 保护的资源（例如 Azure 和 Microsoft Graph）的无缝跨租户访问来增强安全性。

item.title: 【Refresh your Find results】刷新您的查找结果
item.description: 【Are you tired of having to repeatedly launch the Find window in Visual Studio to update your search results? Whether you’ve just refactored some code or pulled recent changes, having to redo a search to get updated results is no longer necessary. With the new refresh option, you can now update your Find results without […]】您是否厌倦了必须在 Visual Studio 中重复启动“查找”窗口来更新搜索结果？无论您刚刚重构了一些代码还是提取了最近的更改，都不再需要重新搜索才能获取更新的结果。使用新的刷新选项，您现在可以更新查找结果，而无需 [...]

item.title: 【Exploring Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData with Qdrant and Azure AI Search】使用 Qdrant 和 Azure AI 搜索探索 Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData
item.description: 【Discover how to use Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData to implement semantic search using Qdrant and Azure AI Search】了解如何使用 Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData 通过 Qdrant 和 Azure AI 搜索实现语义搜索

item.title: 【Microspeak terms that didn’t take hold: airspace, synthetics, and AOI】未流行的 Microspeak 术语：空域、合成物和 AOI
item.description: 【Sometimes they don't stick.】有时它们不粘。

item.title: 【GitHub Copilot Free is here in Visual Studio】GitHub Copilot 免费位于 Visual Studio 中
item.description: 【If you haven’t already heard, GitHub just announced Copilot Free! And great news: you can already start using Copilot Free right now in Visual Studio. It’s available now, and we’re putting the finishing touches on a more streamlined experience in January. We’re excited to bring these benefits to the entire Visual Studio family. With Copilot […]】如果您还没有听说过，GitHub 刚刚宣布了 Copilot 免费！好消息：您现在就可以在 Visual Studio 中开始使用 Copilot Free。它现已推出，我们将在一月份对更加简化的体验进行收尾工作。我们很高兴能够将这些优势带给整个 Visual Studio 系列。与副驾驶[...]

item.title: 【Is there a way to split the git history of a file or combine the histories of two files without a merge commit?】有没有办法分割文件的 git 历史记录或合并两个文件的历史记录而无需合并提交？
item.description: 【Studying how git recovers history.】研究 git 如何恢复历史记录。

item.title: 【Embedding models and dimensions: optimizing the performance to resource-usage ratio】嵌入模型和维度：优化性能与资源利用率
item.description: 【Since the release of vector preview, we’ve been working with many customers that are building AI solution on Azure SQL and SQL Server and one of the most common questions is how to support high-dimensional data, for example more than 2000 dimensions per vector. In fact, at the moment, the vector type supports “only” up […]】自矢量预览版发布以来，我们一直在与许多在 Azure SQL 和 SQL Server 上构建 AI 解决方案的客户合作，最常见的问题之一是如何支持高维数据，例如每个矢量超过 2000 个维度。事实上，目前，向量类型“仅”支持 [...]

item.title: 【Azure SQL ❤️ Python!】Azure SQL ❤️ Python！
item.description: 【I recently presented at Python Day 2024 on Langchain integration. I created a slide deck that I believe can be useful beyond just the session, so I wanted to share it here for everyone’s benefit. The deck covers the most common topics for a Python developer: Is there a free version of SQL Server or […]】我最近在 2024 年 Python Day 上发表了有关 Langchain 集成的演讲。我创建了一个幻灯片，我相信它除了会议之外还有用，所以我想在这里分享它，以造福于每个人。该套牌涵盖了 Python 开发人员最常见的主题：是否有 SQL Server 的免费版本或 [...]
